text: Nichampalayam is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 23 km from Gobichettipalayam and 25 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Perundurai. Nichampalayam has a population of about 1529. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Nichampalayam
